columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Name of action to be described.

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: Localized description displayed in progress dialog and log when action is executing.

columnDefinition.name: Template
columnDefinition.description: Optional localized format template used to format action data records for display during action execution.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Name of action to invoke, either in the engine or the handler DLL.

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: Optional expression which skips the action if evaluates to expFalse.If the expression syntax is invalid, the engine will terminate, returning iesBadActionData.

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Number that determines the sort order in which the actions are to be executed. Leave blank to suppress action.

columnDefinition.name: Feature_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a Feature entry in Feature table.

columnDefinition.name: Level
columnDefinition.description: New selection Level to set in Feature table if Condition evaluates to TRUE.

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: Expression evaluated to determine if Level in the Feature table is to change.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Name of action to invoke, either in the engine or the handler DLL.

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: Optional expression which skips the action if evaluates to expFalse.If the expression syntax is invalid, the engine will terminate, returning iesBadActionData.

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Number that determines the sort order in which the actions are to be executed. Leave blank to suppress action.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Name of action to invoke, either in the engine or the handler DLL.

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: Optional expression which skips the action if evaluates to expFalse.If the expression syntax is invalid, the engine will terminate, returning iesBadActionData.

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Number that determines the sort order in which the actions are to be executed. Leave blank to suppress action.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Name of action to invoke, either in the engine or the handler DLL.

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: Optional expression which skips the action if evaluates to expFalse.If the expression syntax is invalid, the engine will terminate, returning iesBadActionData.

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Number that determines the sort order in which the actions are to be executed. Leave blank to suppress action.

columnDefinition.name: Property
columnDefinition.description: The property associated with a Signature

columnDefinition.name: Signature_
columnDefinition.description: The Signature_ represents a unique file signature and is also the foreign key in the Signature, RegLocator, IniLocator, CompLocator and the DrLocator tables.

columnDefinition.name: Property
columnDefinition.description: Name of property, uppercase if settable by launcher or loader.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: String value for property. Never null or empty.

columnDefinition.name: Billboard_
columnDefinition.description: External key to the Billboard table, name of the billboard.

columnDefinition.name: BBControl
columnDefinition.description: Name of the control. This name must be unique within a billboard, but can repeat on different billboard.

columnDefinition.name: Type
columnDefinition.description: The type of the control.

columnDefinition.name: X
columnDefinition.description: Horizontal coordinate of the upper left corner of the bounding rectangle of the control.

columnDefinition.name: Y
columnDefinition.description: Vertical coordinate of the upper left corner of the bounding rectangle of the control.

columnDefinition.name: Width
columnDefinition.description: Width of the bounding rectangle of the control.

columnDefinition.name: Height
columnDefinition.description: Height of the bounding rectangle of the control.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: A 32-bit word that specifies the attribute flags to be applied to this control.

columnDefinition.name: Text
columnDefinition.description: A string used to set the initial text contained within a control (if appropriate).

columnDefinition.name: Billboard
columnDefinition.description: Name of the billboard.

columnDefinition.name: Feature_
columnDefinition.description: An external key to the Feature Table. The billboard is shown only if this feature is being installed.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: The name of an action. The billboard is displayed during the progress messages received from this action.

columnDefinition.name: Ordering
columnDefinition.description: A positive integer. If there is more than one billboard corresponding to an action they will be shown in the order defined by this column.

columnDefinition.name: Feature
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify a particular feature record.

columnDefinition.name: Feature_Parent
columnDefinition.description: Optional key of a parent record in the same table. If the parent is not selected, then the record will not be installed. Null indicates a root item.

columnDefinition.name: Title
columnDefinition.description: Short text identifying a visible feature item.

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: Longer descriptive text describing a visible feature item.

columnDefinition.name: Display
columnDefinition.description: Numeric sort order, used to force a specific display ordering.

columnDefinition.name: Level
columnDefinition.description: The install level at which record will be initially selected. An install level of 0 will disable an item and prevent its display.

columnDefinition.name: Directory_
columnDefinition.description: The name of the Directory that can be configured by the UI. A non-null value will enable the browse button.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: Feature attributes

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Unique key identifying the binary data.

columnDefinition.name: Data
columnDefinition.description: The unformatted binary data.

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: The index into the File table. This must be an executable file.

columnDefinition.name: Path
columnDefinition.description: A list of ; delimited paths that represent the paths to be searched for the import DLLS. The list is usually a list of properties each enclosed within square brackets [] .

columnDefinition.name: File
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token, must match identifier in cabinet. For uncompressed files, this field is ignored.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key referencing Component that controls the file.

columnDefinition.name: FileName
columnDefinition.description: File name used for installation, may be localized. This may contain a "short name|long name" pair.

columnDefinition.name: FileSize
columnDefinition.description: Size of file in bytes (long integer).

columnDefinition.name: Version
columnDefinition.description: Version string for versioned files; Blank for unversioned files.

columnDefinition.name: Language
columnDefinition.description: List of decimal language Ids, comma-separated if more than one.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: Integer containing bit flags representing file attributes (with the decimal value of each bit position in parentheses)

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Sequence with respect to the media images; order must track cabinet order.

columnDefinition.name: Signature_
columnDefinition.description: The Signature_ represents a unique file signature and is also the foreign key in the Signature, RegLocator, IniLocator, CompLocator and the DrLocator tables.

columnDefinition.name: Property
columnDefinition.description: A named property to be tied to the item.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value string associated with the item.

columnDefinition.name: CLSID
columnDefinition.description: The CLSID of an OLE factory.

columnDefinition.name: Context
columnDefinition.description: The numeric server context for this server. CLSCTX_xxxx

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Required foreign key into the Component Table, specifying the component for which to return a path when called through LocateComponent.

columnDefinition.name: ProgId_Default
columnDefinition.description: Optional ProgId associated with this CLSID.

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: Localized description for the Class.

columnDefinition.name: AppId_
columnDefinition.description: Optional AppID containing DCOM information for associated application (string GUID).

columnDefinition.name: FileTypeMask
columnDefinition.description: Optional string containing information for the HKCRthis CLSID) key. If multiple patterns exist, they must be delimited by a semicolon, and numeric subkeys will be generated: 0,1,2...

columnDefinition.name: Icon_
columnDefinition.description: Optional foreign key into the Icon Table, specifying the icon file associated with this CLSID. Will be written under the DefaultIcon key.

columnDefinition.name: IconIndex
columnDefinition.description: Optional icon index.

columnDefinition.name: DefInprocHandler
columnDefinition.description: Optional default inproc handler. Only optionally provided if Context=CLSCTX_LOCAL_SERVER. Typically "ole32.dll" or "mapi32.dll"

columnDefinition.name: Argument
columnDefinition.description: optional argument for LocalServers.

columnDefinition.name: Feature_
columnDefinition.description: Required foreign key into the Feature Table, specifying the feature to validate or install in order for the CLSID factory to be operational.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: Class registration attributes.

columnDefinition.name: Component
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify a particular component record.

columnDefinition.name: ComponentId
columnDefinition.description: A string GUID unique to this component, version, and language.

columnDefinition.name: Directory_
columnDefinition.description: Required key of a Directory table record. This is actually a property name whose value contains the actual path, set either by the AppSearch action or with the default setting obtained from the Directory table.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: Remote execution option, one of irsEnum

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: A conditional statement that will disable this component if the specified condition evaluates to the 'True' state. If a component is disabled, it will not be installed, regardless of the 'Action' state associated with the component.

columnDefinition.name: KeyPath
columnDefinition.description: Either the primary key into the File table, Registry table, or ODBCDataSource table. This extract path is stored when the component is installed, and is used to detect the presence of the component and to return the path to it.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Primary key. Name of the icon file.

columnDefinition.name: Data
columnDefinition.description: Binary stream. The binary icon data in PE (.DLL or .EXE) or icon (.ICO) format.

columnDefinition.name: ProgId
columnDefinition.description: The Program Identifier. Primary key.

columnDefinition.name: ProgId_Parent
columnDefinition.description: The Parent Program Identifier. If specified, the ProgId column becomes a version independent prog id.

columnDefinition.name: Class_
columnDefinition.description: The CLSID of an OLE factory corresponding to the ProgId.

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: Localized description for the Program identifier.

columnDefinition.name: Icon_
columnDefinition.description: Optional foreign key into the Icon Table, specifying the icon file associated with this ProgId. Will be written under the DefaultIcon key.

columnDefinition.name: IconIndex
columnDefinition.description: Optional icon index.

columnDefinition.name: Property
columnDefinition.description: A named property to be tied to this item. All the items tied to the same property become part of the same combobox.

columnDefinition.name: Order
columnDefinition.description: A positive integer used to determine the ordering of the items within one list. The integers do not have to be consecutive.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value string associated with this item. Selecting the line will set the associated property to this value.

columnDefinition.name: Text
columnDefinition.description: The visible text to be assigned to the item. Optional. If this entry or the entire column is missing, the text is the same as the value.

columnDefinition.name: Signature_
columnDefinition.description: The table key. The Signature_ represents a unique file signature and is also the foreign key in the Signature table.

columnDefinition.name: ComponentId
columnDefinition.description: A string GUID unique to this component, version, and language.

columnDefinition.name: Type
columnDefinition.description: A boolean value that determines if the registry value is a filename or a directory location.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key referencing Component that controls the ComPlus component.

columnDefinition.name: ExpType
columnDefinition.description: ComPlus component attributes.

columnDefinition.name: Directory
columnDefinition.description: Unique identifier for directory entry, primary key. If a property by this name is defined, it contains the full path to the directory.

columnDefinition.name: Directory_Parent
columnDefinition.description: Reference to the entry in this table specifying the default parent directory. A record parented to itself or with a Null parent represents a root of the install tree.

columnDefinition.name: DefaultDir
columnDefinition.description: The default sub-path under parent's path.

columnDefinition.name: Dialog_
columnDefinition.description: External key to the Dialog table, name of the dialog.

columnDefinition.name: Control
columnDefinition.description: Name of the control. This name must be unique within a dialog, but can repeat on different dialogs.

columnDefinition.name: Type
columnDefinition.description: The type of the control.

columnDefinition.name: X
columnDefinition.description: Horizontal coordinate of the upper left corner of the bounding rectangle of the control.

columnDefinition.name: Y
columnDefinition.description: Vertical coordinate of the upper left corner of the bounding rectangle of the control.

columnDefinition.name: Width
columnDefinition.description: Width of the bounding rectangle of the control.

columnDefinition.name: Height
columnDefinition.description: Height of the bounding rectangle of the control.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: A 32-bit word that specifies the attribute flags to be applied to this control.

columnDefinition.name: Property
columnDefinition.description: The name of a defined property to be linked to this control.

columnDefinition.name: Text
columnDefinition.description: A string used to set the initial text contained within a control (if appropriate).

columnDefinition.name: Control_Next
columnDefinition.description: The name of an other control on the same dialog. This link defines the tab order of the controls. The links have to form one or more cycles!

columnDefinition.name: Help
columnDefinition.description: The help strings used with the button. The text is optional.

columnDefinition.name: Dialog
columnDefinition.description: Name of the dialog.

columnDefinition.name: HCentering
columnDefinition.description: Horizontal position of the dialog on a 0-100 scale. 0 means left end, 100 means right end of the screen, 50 center.

columnDefinition.name: VCentering
columnDefinition.description: Vertical position of the dialog on a 0-100 scale. 0 means top end, 100 means bottom end of the screen, 50 center.

columnDefinition.name: Width
columnDefinition.description: Width of the bounding rectangle of the dialog.

columnDefinition.name: Height
columnDefinition.description: Height of the bounding rectangle of the dialog.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: A 32-bit word that specifies the attribute flags to be applied to this dialog.

columnDefinition.name: Title
columnDefinition.description: A text string specifying the title to be displayed in the title bar of the dialog's window.

columnDefinition.name: Control_First
columnDefinition.description: Defines the control that has the focus when the dialog is created.

columnDefinition.name: Control_Default
columnDefinition.description: Defines the default control. Hitting return is equivalent to pushing this button.

columnDefinition.name: Control_Cancel
columnDefinition.description: Defines the cancel control. Hitting escape or clicking on the close icon on the dialog is equivalent to pushing this button.

columnDefinition.name: Dialog_
columnDefinition.description: A foreign key to the Dialog table, name of the dialog.

columnDefinition.name: Control_
columnDefinition.description: A foreign key to the Control table, name of the control.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: The desired action to be taken on the specified control.

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: A standard conditional statement that specifies under which conditions the action should be triggered.

columnDefinition.name: Dialog_
columnDefinition.description: A foreign key to the Dialog table, name of the dialog.

columnDefinition.name: Control_
columnDefinition.description: A foreign key to the Control table, name of the control

columnDefinition.name: Event
columnDefinition.description: An identifier that specifies the type of the event that should take place when the user interacts with control specified by the first two entries.

columnDefinition.name: Argument
columnDefinition.description: A value to be used as a modifier when triggering a particular event.

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: A standard conditional statement that specifies under which conditions an event should be triggered.

columnDefinition.name: Ordering
columnDefinition.description: An integer used to order several events tied to the same control. Can be left blank.

columnDefinition.name: Directory_
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, could be foreign key into the Directory table.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Component table.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, name of action, normally appears in sequence table unless private use.

columnDefinition.name: Type
columnDefinition.description: The numeric custom action type, consisting of source location, code type, entry, option flags.

columnDefinition.name: Source
columnDefinition.description: The table reference of the source of the code.

columnDefinition.name: Target
columnDefinition.description: Excecution parameter, depends on the type of custom action

columnDefinition.name: ExtendedType
columnDefinition.description: A numeric custom action type that extends code type or option flags of the Type column.

columnDefinition.name: Signature_
columnDefinition.description: The Signature_ represents a unique file signature and is also the foreign key in the Signature table.

columnDefinition.name: Parent
columnDefinition.description: The parent file signature. It is also a foreign key in the Signature table. If null and the Path column does not expand to a full path, then all the fixed drives of the user system are searched using the Path.

columnDefinition.name: Path
columnDefinition.description: The path on the user system. This is a either a subpath below the value of the Parent or a full path. The path may contain properties enclosed within [ ] that will be expanded.

columnDefinition.name: Depth
columnDefinition.description: The depth below the path to which the Signature_ is recursively searched. If absent, the depth is assumed to be 0.

columnDefinition.name: FileKey
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify a particular file entry

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key referencing Component that controls the duplicate file.

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key referencing the source file to be duplicated.

columnDefinition.name: DestName
columnDefinition.description: Filename to be given to the duplicate file.

columnDefinition.name: DestFolder
columnDefinition.description: Name of a property whose value is assumed to resolve to the full pathname to a destination folder.

columnDefinition.name: Environment
columnDefinition.description: Unique identifier for the environmental variable setting

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: The name of the environmental value.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value to set in the environmental settings.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Component table referencing component that controls the installing of the environmental value.

columnDefinition.name: Error
columnDefinition.description: Integer error number, obtained from header file IError(...) macros.

columnDefinition.name: Message
columnDefinition.description: Error formatting template, obtained from user ed. or localizers.

columnDefinition.name: Dialog_
columnDefinition.description: A foreign key to the Dialog table, name of the Dialog.

columnDefinition.name: Control_
columnDefinition.description: A foreign key to the Control table, name of the control.

columnDefinition.name: Event
columnDefinition.description: An identifier that specifies the type of the event that the control subscribes to.

columnDefinition.name: Attribute
columnDefinition.description: The name of the control attribute, that is set when this event is received.

columnDefinition.name: Extension
columnDefinition.description: The extension associated with the table row.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Required foreign key into the Component Table, specifying the component for which to return a path when called through LocateComponent.

columnDefinition.name: ProgId_
columnDefinition.description: Optional ProgId associated with this extension.

columnDefinition.name: MIME_
columnDefinition.description: Optional Context identifier, typically "type/format" associated with the extension

columnDefinition.name: Feature_
columnDefinition.description: Required foreign key into the Feature Table, specifying the feature to validate or install in order for the CLSID factory to be operational.

columnDefinition.name: ContentType
columnDefinition.description: Primary key. Context identifier, typically "type/format".

columnDefinition.name: Extension_
columnDefinition.description: Optional associated extension (without dot)

columnDefinition.name: CLSID
columnDefinition.description: Optional associated CLSID.

columnDefinition.name: Feature_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into Feature table.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into Component table.

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: File associated with the catalog

columnDefinition.name: SFPCatalog_
columnDefinition.description: Catalog associated with the file

columnDefinition.name: SFPCatalog
columnDefinition.description: File name for the catalog.

columnDefinition.name: Catalog
columnDefinition.description: SFP Catalog

columnDefinition.name: Dependency
columnDefinition.description: Parent catalog - only used by SFP

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, foreign key into File table referencing font file.

columnDefinition.name: FontTitle
columnDefinition.description: Font name.

columnDefinition.name: IniFile
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token.

columnDefinition.name: FileName
columnDefinition.description: The .INI file name in which to write the information

columnDefinition.name: DirProperty
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Directory table denoting the directory where the .INI file is.

columnDefinition.name: Section
columnDefinition.description: The .INI file Section.

columnDefinition.name: Key
columnDefinition.description: The .INI file key below Section.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value to be written.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: The type of modification to be made, one of iifEnum

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Component table referencing component that controls the installing of the .INI value.

columnDefinition.name: Signature_
columnDefinition.description: The table key. The Signature_ represents a unique file signature and is also the foreign key in the Signature table.

columnDefinition.name: FileName
columnDefinition.description: The .INI file name.

columnDefinition.name: Section
columnDefinition.description: Section name within in file (within square brackets in INI file).

columnDefinition.name: Key
columnDefinition.description: Key value (followed by an equals sign in INI file).

columnDefinition.name: Field
columnDefinition.description: The field in the .INI line. If Field is null or 0 the entire line is read.

columnDefinition.name: Type
columnDefinition.description: An integer value that determines if the .INI value read is a filename or a directory location or to be used as is w/o interpretation.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Name of action to invoke, either in the engine or the handler DLL.

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: Optional expression which skips the action if evaluates to expFalse.If the expression syntax is invalid, the engine will terminate, returning iesBadActionData.

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Number that determines the sort order in which the actions are to be executed. Leave blank to suppress action.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Name of action to invoke, either in the engine or the handler DLL.

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: Optional expression which skips the action if evaluates to expFalse.If the expression syntax is invalid, the engine will terminate, returning iesBadActionData.

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Number that determines the sort order in which the actions are to be executed. Leave blank to suppress action.

columnDefinition.name: Component_Shared
columnDefinition.description: Key to Component table item to be isolated

columnDefinition.name: Component_Application
columnDefinition.description: Key to Component table item for application

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: Expression which must evaluate to TRUE in order for install to commence.

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: Localizable text to display when condition fails and install must abort.

columnDefinition.name: Property
columnDefinition.description: A named property to be tied to this item. All the items tied to the same property become part of the same listbox.

columnDefinition.name: Order
columnDefinition.description: A positive integer used to determine the ordering of the items within one list..The integers do not have to be consecutive.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value string associated with this item. Selecting the line will set the associated property to this value.

columnDefinition.name: Text
columnDefinition.description: The visible text to be assigned to the item. Optional. If this entry or the entire column is missing, the text is the same as the value.

columnDefinition.name: Property
columnDefinition.description: A named property to be tied to this item. All the items tied to the same property become part of the same listview.

columnDefinition.name: Order
columnDefinition.description: A positive integer used to determine the ordering of the items within one list..The integers do not have to be consecutive.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value string associated with this item. Selecting the line will set the associated property to this value.

columnDefinition.name: Text
columnDefinition.description: The visible text to be assigned to the item. Optional. If this entry or the entire column is missing, the text is the same as the value.

columnDefinition.name: Binary_
columnDefinition.description: The name of the icon to be displayed with the icon. The binary information is looked up from the Binary Table.

columnDefinition.name: LockObject
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into Registry or File table

columnDefinition.name: Table
columnDefinition.description: Reference to another table name

columnDefinition.name: Domain
columnDefinition.description: Domain name for user whose permissions are being set. (usually a property)

columnDefinition.name: User
columnDefinition.description: User for permissions to be set. (usually a property)

columnDefinition.name: Permission
columnDefinition.description: Permission Access mask. Full Control = 268435456 (GENERIC_ALL = 0x10000000)

columnDefinition.name: MsiLockPermissionsEx
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token

columnDefinition.name: LockObject
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into Registry, File, CreateFolder, or ServiceInstall table

columnDefinition.name: Table
columnDefinition.description: Reference to another table name

columnDefinition.name: SDDLText
columnDefinition.description: String to indicate permissions to be applied to the LockObject

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: Expression which must evaluate to TRUE in order for this set of permissions to be applied

columnDefinition.name: DiskId
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, integer to determine sort order for table.

columnDefinition.name: LastSequence
columnDefinition.description: File sequence number for the last file for this media.

columnDefinition.name: DiskPrompt
columnDefinition.description: Disk name: the visible text actually printed on the disk. This will be used to prompt the user when this disk needs to be inserted.

columnDefinition.name: Cabinet
columnDefinition.description: If some or all of the files stored on the media are compressed in a cabinet, the name of that cabinet.

columnDefinition.name: VolumeLabel
columnDefinition.description: The label attributed to the volume.

columnDefinition.name: Source
columnDefinition.description: The property defining the location of the cabinet file.

columnDefinition.name: FileKey
columnDefinition.description: Primary key that uniquely identifies a particular MoveFile record

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: If this component is not "selected" for installation or removal, no action will be taken on the associated MoveFile entry

columnDefinition.name: SourceName
columnDefinition.description: Name of the source file(s) to be moved or copied. Can contain the '*' or '?' wildcards.

columnDefinition.name: DestName
columnDefinition.description: Name to be given to the original file after it is moved or copied. If blank, the destination file will be given the same name as the source file

columnDefinition.name: SourceFolder
columnDefinition.description: Name of a property whose value is assumed to resolve to the full path to the source directory

columnDefinition.name: DestFolder
columnDefinition.description: Name of a property whose value is assumed to resolve to the full path to the destination directory

columnDefinition.name: Options
columnDefinition.description: Integer value specifying the MoveFile operating mode, one of imfoEnum

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into Component table.

columnDefinition.name: Feature_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into Feature table.

columnDefinition.name: File_Manifest
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the File table denoting the manifest file for the assembly.

columnDefinition.name: File_Application
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into File table, denoting the application context for private assemblies. Null for global assemblies.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: Assembly attributes

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into Component table.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: The name part of the name-value pairs for the assembly name.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value part of the name-value pairs for the assembly name.

columnDefinition.name: DigitalCertificate
columnDefinition.description: A unique identifier for the row

columnDefinition.name: CertData
columnDefinition.description: A certificate context blob for a signer certificate

columnDefinition.name: Table
columnDefinition.description: Reference to another table name (only Media table is supported)

columnDefinition.name: SignObject
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key to Media table

columnDefinition.name: DigitalCertificate_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key to MsiDigitalCertificate table identifying the signer certificate

columnDefinition.name: Hash
columnDefinition.description: The encoded hash blob from the digital signature

columnDefinition.name: MsiEmbeddedChainer
columnDefinition.description: The primary key for the table.

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: A conditional statement for running the user-defined function.

columnDefinition.name: CommandLine
columnDefinition.description: The value in this field is a part of the command line string passed to the executable file identified in the Source column.

columnDefinition.name: Source
columnDefinition.description: The location of the executable file for the user-defined function.

columnDefinition.name: Type
columnDefinition.description: The functions listed in the MsiEmbeddedChainer table are described using the following custom action numeric types.

columnDefinition.name: MsiEmbeddedUI
columnDefinition.description: The primary key for the table.

columnDefinition.name: FileName
columnDefinition.description: The name of the file that receives the binary information in the Data column.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: Information about the data in the Data column.

columnDefinition.name: MessageFilter
columnDefinition.description: Specifies the types of messages that are sent to the user interface DLL.

columnDefinition.name: Data
columnDefinition.description: This column contains binary information.

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, foreign key into File table referencing file with this hash

columnDefinition.name: Options
columnDefinition.description: Various options and attributes for this hash.

columnDefinition.name: HashPart1
columnDefinition.description: Size of file in bytes (long integer).

columnDefinition.name: HashPart2
columnDefinition.description: Size of file in bytes (long integer).

columnDefinition.name: HashPart3
columnDefinition.description: Size of file in bytes (long integer).

columnDefinition.name: HashPart4
columnDefinition.description: Size of file in bytes (long integer).

columnDefinition.name: PackageCertificate
columnDefinition.description: Primary key. A unique identifier for the row.

columnDefinition.name: DigitalCertificate_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key to MsiDigitalCertificate table identifying the signer certificate.

columnDefinition.name: PatchCertificate
columnDefinition.description: Primary key. A unique identifier for the row.

columnDefinition.name: DigitalCertificate_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key to MsiDigitalCertificate table identifying the signer certificate.

columnDefinition.name: StreamRef
columnDefinition.description: Primary key. A unique identifier for the row.

columnDefinition.name: Header
columnDefinition.description: Binary stream. The patch header, used for patch validation.

columnDefinition.name: Company
columnDefinition.description: Primary key. The name of the company.

columnDefinition.name: Property
columnDefinition.description: Primary key. The name of the property.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: Non-null, non-empty value of the metadata property.

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into File table. Patch-only table.

columnDefinition.name: Assembly_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into MsiPatchOldAssemblyName table.

columnDefinition.name: Assembly
columnDefinition.description: A unique identifier for the row.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: The name part of the name-value pairs for the assembly name. This represents the old name for the assembly.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value part of the name-value pairs for the assembly name. This represents the old name for the assembly.

columnDefinition.name: PatchFamily
columnDefinition.description: Primary key. The name of the family for the patch.

columnDefinition.name: Target
columnDefinition.description: Primary key. Determines product code filtering for family.

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Sequence information in version (x.x.x.x) format.

columnDefinition.name: Supersede
columnDefinition.description: Indicates that this patch supersedes earlier patches.

columnDefinition.name: Driver_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to ODBC driver in ODBCDriver table

columnDefinition.name: Attribute
columnDefinition.description: Name of ODBC driver attribute

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: Value for ODBC driver attribute

columnDefinition.name: Driver
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized.internal token for driver

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to associated component

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: Text used as registered name for driver, non-localized

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to key driver file

columnDefinition.name: File_Setup
columnDefinition.description: Optional reference to key driver setup DLL

columnDefinition.name: DataSource
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized.internal token for data source

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to associated component

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: Text used as registered name for data source

columnDefinition.name: DriverDescription
columnDefinition.description: Reference to driver description, may be existing driver

columnDefinition.name: Registration
columnDefinition.description: Registration option: 0=machine, 1=user, others t.b.d.

columnDefinition.name: DataSource_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to ODBC data source in ODBCDataSource table

columnDefinition.name: Attribute
columnDefinition.description: Name of ODBC data source attribute

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: Value for ODBC data source attribute

columnDefinition.name: Translator
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized.internal token for translator

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to associated component

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: Text used as registered name for translator

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to key translator file

columnDefinition.name: File_Setup
columnDefinition.description: Optional reference to key translator setup DLL

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token, foreign key to File table, must match identifier in cabinet.

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, sequence with respect to the media images; order must track cabinet order.

columnDefinition.name: PatchSize
columnDefinition.description: Size of patch in bytes (long integer).

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: Integer containing bit flags representing patch attributes

columnDefinition.name: Header
columnDefinition.description: Binary stream. The patch header, used for patch validation.

columnDefinition.name: StreamRef_
columnDefinition.description: Identifier. Foreign key to the StreamRef column of the MsiPatchHeaders table.

columnDefinition.name: PatchId
columnDefinition.description: A unique string GUID representing this patch.

columnDefinition.name: Media_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key to DiskId column of Media table. Indicates the disk containing the patch package.

columnDefinition.name: ComponentId
columnDefinition.description: A string GUID that represents the component id that will be requested by the alien product.

columnDefinition.name: Qualifier
columnDefinition.description: This is defined only when the ComponentId column is an Qualified Component Id. This is the Qualifier for ProvideComponentIndirect.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Component table.

columnDefinition.name: AppData
columnDefinition.description: This is localisable Application specific data that can be associated with a Qualified Component.

columnDefinition.name: Feature_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Feature table.

columnDefinition.name: Property
columnDefinition.description: A named property to be tied to this radio button. All the buttons tied to the same property become part of the same group.

columnDefinition.name: Order
columnDefinition.description: A positive integer used to determine the ordering of the items within one list..The integers do not have to be consecutive.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value string associated with this button. Selecting the button will set the associated property to this value.

columnDefinition.name: X
columnDefinition.description: The horizontal coordinate of the upper left corner of the bounding rectangle of the radio button.

columnDefinition.name: Y
columnDefinition.description: The vertical coordinate of the upper left corner of the bounding rectangle of the radio button.

columnDefinition.name: Width
columnDefinition.description: The width of the button.

columnDefinition.name: Height
columnDefinition.description: The height of the button.

columnDefinition.name: Text
columnDefinition.description: The visible title to be assigned to the radio button.

columnDefinition.name: Help
columnDefinition.description: The help strings used with the button. The text is optional.

columnDefinition.name: Registry
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token.

columnDefinition.name: Root
columnDefinition.description: The predefined root key for the registry value, one of rrkEnum.

columnDefinition.name: Key
columnDefinition.description: The key for the registry value.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: The registry value name.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The registry value.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Component table referencing component that controls the installing of the registry value.

columnDefinition.name: Signature_
columnDefinition.description: The table key. The Signature_ represents a unique file signature and is also the foreign key in the Signature table. If the type is 0, the registry values refers a directory, and _Signature is not a foreign key.

columnDefinition.name: Root
columnDefinition.description: The predefined root key for the registry value, one of rrkEnum.

columnDefinition.name: Key
columnDefinition.description: The key for the registry value.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: The registry value name.

columnDefinition.name: Type
columnDefinition.description: An integer value that determines if the registry value is a filename or a directory location or to be used as is w/o interpretation.

columnDefinition.name: FileKey
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify a particular file entry

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key referencing Component that controls the file to be removed.

columnDefinition.name: FileName
columnDefinition.description: Name of the file to be removed.

columnDefinition.name: DirProperty
columnDefinition.description: Name of a property whose value is assumed to resolve to the full pathname to the folder of the file to be removed.

columnDefinition.name: InstallMode
columnDefinition.description: Installation option, one of iimEnum.

columnDefinition.name: RemoveIniFile
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token.

columnDefinition.name: FileName
columnDefinition.description: The .INI file name in which to delete the information

columnDefinition.name: DirProperty
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Directory table denoting the directory where the .INI file is.

columnDefinition.name: Section
columnDefinition.description: The .INI file Section.

columnDefinition.name: Key
columnDefinition.description: The .INI file key below Section.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value to be deleted. The value is required when Action is iifIniRemoveTag

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: The type of modification to be made, one of iifEnum.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Component table referencing component that controls the deletion of the .INI value.

columnDefinition.name: RemoveRegistry
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token.

columnDefinition.name: Root
columnDefinition.description: The predefined root key for the registry value, one of rrkEnum

columnDefinition.name: Key
columnDefinition.description: The key for the registry value.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: The registry value name.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Component table referencing component that controls the deletion of the registry value.

columnDefinition.name: ReserveKey
columnDefinition.description: Primary key that uniquely identifies a particular ReserveCost record

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Reserve a specified amount of space if this component is to be installed.

columnDefinition.name: ReserveFolder
columnDefinition.description: Name of a property whose value is assumed to resolve to the full path to the destination directory

columnDefinition.name: ReserveLocal
columnDefinition.description: Disk space to reserve if linked component is installed locally.

columnDefinition.name: ReserveSource
columnDefinition.description: Disk space to reserve if linked component is installed to run from the source location.

columnDefinition.name: File_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the File table denoting the module that needs to be registered.

columnDefinition.name: Cost
columnDefinition.description: The cost of registering the module.

columnDefinition.name: ServiceControl
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Name of a service. /, \, comma and space are invalid

columnDefinition.name: Event
columnDefinition.description: Bit field: Install: 0x1 = Start, 0x2 = Stop, 0x8 = Delete, Uninstall: 0x10 = Start, 0x20 = Stop, 0x80 = Delete

columnDefinition.name: Arguments
columnDefinition.description: Arguments for the service. Separate by [~].

columnDefinition.name: Wait
columnDefinition.description: Boolean for whether to wait for the service to fully start

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Required foreign key into the Component Table that controls the startup of the service

columnDefinition.name: ServiceInstall
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Internal Name of the Service

columnDefinition.name: DisplayName
columnDefinition.description: External Name of the Service

columnDefinition.name: ServiceType
columnDefinition.description: Type of the service

columnDefinition.name: StartType
columnDefinition.description: Type of the service

columnDefinition.name: ErrorControl
columnDefinition.description: Severity of error if service fails to start

columnDefinition.name: Dependencies
columnDefinition.description: Other services this depends on to start. Separate by [~], and end with [~][~]

columnDefinition.name: StartName
columnDefinition.description: User or object name to run service as

columnDefinition.name: Password
columnDefinition.description: password to run service with. (with StartName)

columnDefinition.name: Arguments
columnDefinition.description: Arguments to include in every start of the service, passed to WinMain

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Required foreign key into the Component Table that controls the startup of the service

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: Description of service.

columnDefinition.name: MsiServiceConfig
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Name of a service. /, \, comma and space are invalid

columnDefinition.name: Event
columnDefinition.description: Bit field: 0x1 = Install, 0x2 = Uninstall, 0x4 = Reinstall

columnDefinition.name: ConfigType
columnDefinition.description: Service Configuration Option

columnDefinition.name: Argument
columnDefinition.description: Argument(s) for service configuration. Value depends on the content of the ConfigType field

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Required foreign key into the Component Table that controls the configuration of the service

columnDefinition.name: MsiServiceConfigFailureActions
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Name of a service. /, \, comma and space are invalid

columnDefinition.name: Event
columnDefinition.description: Bit field: 0x1 = Install, 0x2 = Uninstall, 0x4 = Reinstall

columnDefinition.name: ResetPeriod
columnDefinition.description: Time in seconds after which to reset the failure count to zero. Leave blank if it should never be reset

columnDefinition.name: RebootMessage
columnDefinition.description: Message to be broadcast to server users before rebooting

columnDefinition.name: Command
columnDefinition.description: Command line of the process to CreateProcess function to execute

columnDefinition.name: Actions
columnDefinition.description: A list of integer actions separated by [~] delimiters: 0 = SC_ACTION_NONE, 1 = SC_ACTION_RESTART, 2 = SC_ACTION_REBOOT, 3 = SC_ACTION_RUN_COMMAND. Terminate with [~][~]

columnDefinition.name: DelayActions
columnDefinition.description: A list of delays (time in milli-seconds), separated by [~] delmiters, to wait before taking the corresponding Action. Terminate with [~][~]

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Required foreign key into the Component Table that controls the configuration of failure actions for the service

columnDefinition.name: Shortcut
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token.

columnDefinition.name: Directory_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Directory table denoting the directory where the shortcut file is created.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: The name of the shortcut to be created.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Component table denoting the component whose selection gates the the shortcut creation/deletion.

columnDefinition.name: Target
columnDefinition.description: The shortcut target. This is usually a property that is expanded to a file or a folder that the shortcut points to.

columnDefinition.name: Arguments
columnDefinition.description: The command-line arguments for the shortcut.

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: The description for the shortcut.

columnDefinition.name: Hotkey
columnDefinition.description: The hotkey for the shortcut. It has the virtual-key code for the key in the low-order byte, and the modifier flags in the high-order byte.

columnDefinition.name: Icon_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the File table denoting the external icon file for the shortcut.

columnDefinition.name: IconIndex
columnDefinition.description: The icon index for the shortcut.

columnDefinition.name: ShowCmd
columnDefinition.description: The show command for the application window.The following values may be used.

columnDefinition.name: WkDir
columnDefinition.description: Name of property defining location of working directory.

columnDefinition.name: DisplayResourceDLL
columnDefinition.description: The Formatted string providing the full path to the language neutral file containing the MUI Manifest.

columnDefinition.name: DisplayResourceId
columnDefinition.description: The display name index for the shortcut. This must be a non-negative number.

columnDefinition.name: DescriptionResourceDLL
columnDefinition.description: The Formatted string providing the full path to the language neutral file containing the MUI Manifest.

columnDefinition.name: DescriptionResourceId
columnDefinition.description: The description name index for the shortcut. This must be a non-negative number.

columnDefinition.name: MsiShortcutProperty
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token

columnDefinition.name: Shortcut_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Shortcut table

columnDefinition.name: PropertyKey
columnDefinition.description: Canonical string representation of the Property Key being set

columnDefinition.name: PropVariantValue
columnDefinition.description: String representation of the value in the property

columnDefinition.name: Signature
columnDefinition.description: The table key. The Signature represents a unique file signature.

columnDefinition.name: FileName
columnDefinition.description: The name of the file. This may contain a "short name|long name" pair.

columnDefinition.name: MinVersion
columnDefinition.description: The minimum version of the file.

columnDefinition.name: MaxVersion
columnDefinition.description: The maximum version of the file.

columnDefinition.name: MinSize
columnDefinition.description: The minimum size of the file.

columnDefinition.name: MaxSize
columnDefinition.description: The maximum size of the file.

columnDefinition.name: MinDate
columnDefinition.description: The minimum creation date of the file.

columnDefinition.name: MaxDate
columnDefinition.description: The maximum creation date of the file.

columnDefinition.name: Languages
columnDefinition.description: The languages supported by the file.

columnDefinition.name: TextStyle
columnDefinition.description: Name of the style. The primary key of this table. This name is embedded in the texts to indicate a style change.

columnDefinition.name: FaceName
columnDefinition.description: A string indicating the name of the font used. Required. The string must be at most 31 characters long.

columnDefinition.name: Size
columnDefinition.description: The size of the font used. This size is given in our units (1/12 of the system font height). Assuming that the system font is set to 12 point size, this is equivalent to the point size.

columnDefinition.name: Color
columnDefinition.description: A long integer indicating the color of the string in the RGB format (Red, Green, Blue each 0-255, RGB = R + 256*G + 256^2*B).

columnDefinition.name: StyleBits
columnDefinition.description: A combination of style bits.

columnDefinition.name: LibID
columnDefinition.description: The GUID that represents the library.

columnDefinition.name: Language
columnDefinition.description: The language of the library.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Required foreign key into the Component Table, specifying the component for which to return a path when called through LocateComponent.

columnDefinition.name: Version
columnDefinition.description: The version of the library. The minor version is in the lower 8 bits of the integer. The major version is in the next 16 bits.

columnDefinition.name: Directory_
columnDefinition.description: Optional. The foreign key into the Directory table denoting the path to the help file for the type library.

columnDefinition.name: Feature_
columnDefinition.description: Required foreign key into the Feature Table, specifying the feature to validate or install in order for the type library to be operational.

columnDefinition.name: Cost
columnDefinition.description: The cost associated with the registration of the typelib. This column is currently optional.

columnDefinition.name: Key
columnDefinition.description: A unique key that identifies the particular string.

columnDefinition.name: Text
columnDefinition.description: The localized version of the string.

columnDefinition.name: UpgradeCode
columnDefinition.description: The UpgradeCode GUID belonging to the products in this set.

columnDefinition.name: VersionMin
columnDefinition.description: The minimum ProductVersion of the products in this set. The set may or may not include products with this particular version.

columnDefinition.name: VersionMax
columnDefinition.description: The maximum ProductVersion of the products in this set. The set may or may not include products with this particular version.

columnDefinition.name: Language
columnDefinition.description: A comma-separated list of languages for either products in this set or products not in this set.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: The attributes of this product set.

columnDefinition.name: Remove
columnDefinition.description: The list of features to remove when uninstalling a product from this set. The default is "ALL".

columnDefinition.name: ActionProperty
columnDefinition.description: The property to set when a product in this set is found.

columnDefinition.name: Extension_
columnDefinition.description: The extension associated with the table row.

columnDefinition.name: Verb
columnDefinition.description: The verb for the command.

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Order within the verbs for a particular extension. Also used simply to specify the default verb.

columnDefinition.name: Command
columnDefinition.description: The command text.

columnDefinition.name: Argument
columnDefinition.description: Optional value for the command arguments.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Action to insert

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Standard Sequence number

columnDefinition.name: BaseAction
columnDefinition.description: Base action to determine insert location.

columnDefinition.name: After
columnDefinition.description: Before (0) or After (1)

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Action to insert

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Standard Sequence number

columnDefinition.name: BaseAction
columnDefinition.description: Base action to determine insert location.

columnDefinition.name: After
columnDefinition.description: Before (0) or After (1)

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Action to insert

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Standard Sequence number

columnDefinition.name: BaseAction
columnDefinition.description: Base action to determine insert location.

columnDefinition.name: After
columnDefinition.description: Before (0) or After (1)

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Action to insert

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Standard Sequence number

columnDefinition.name: BaseAction
columnDefinition.description: Base action to determine insert location.

columnDefinition.name: After
columnDefinition.description: Before (0) or After (1)

columnDefinition.name: Component
columnDefinition.description: Component contained in the module.

columnDefinition.name: ModuleID
columnDefinition.description: Module containing the component.

columnDefinition.name: Language
columnDefinition.description: Default language ID for module (may be changed by transform).

columnDefinition.name: ModuleID
columnDefinition.description: Module identifier (String.GUID).

columnDefinition.name: Language
columnDefinition.description: Default decimal language of module.

columnDefinition.name: Version
columnDefinition.description: Version of the module.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Unique identifier for this row.

columnDefinition.name: Format
columnDefinition.description: Format of this item.

columnDefinition.name: Type
columnDefinition.description: Additional type information for this item.

columnDefinition.name: ContextData
columnDefinition.description: Additional context information about this item.

columnDefinition.name: DefaultValue
columnDefinition.description: Default value for this item.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: Additional type-specific attributes.

columnDefinition.name: DisplayName
columnDefinition.description: A short human-readable name for this item.

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: A human-readable description.

columnDefinition.name: HelpLocation
columnDefinition.description: Filename or namespace of the context-sensitive help for this item.

columnDefinition.name: HelpKeyword
columnDefinition.description: Keyword index into the HelpLocation for this item.

columnDefinition.name: ModuleID
columnDefinition.description: Module requiring the dependency.

columnDefinition.name: ModuleLanguage
columnDefinition.description: Language of module requiring the dependency.

columnDefinition.name: RequiredID
columnDefinition.description: String.GUID of required module.

columnDefinition.name: RequiredLanguage
columnDefinition.description: LanguageID of the required module.

columnDefinition.name: RequiredVersion
columnDefinition.description: Version of the required version.

columnDefinition.name: ModuleID
columnDefinition.description: String.GUID of module with exclusion requirement.

columnDefinition.name: ModuleLanguage
columnDefinition.description: LanguageID of module with exclusion requirement.

columnDefinition.name: ExcludedID
columnDefinition.description: String.GUID of excluded module.

columnDefinition.name: ExcludedLanguage
columnDefinition.description: Language of excluded module.

columnDefinition.name: ExcludedMinVersion
columnDefinition.description: Minimum version of excluded module.

columnDefinition.name: ExcludedMaxVersion
columnDefinition.description: Maximum version of excluded module.

columnDefinition.name: Table
columnDefinition.description: Table name to ignore during merge operation.

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Action to insert

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Standard Sequence number

columnDefinition.name: BaseAction
columnDefinition.description: Base action to determine insert location.

columnDefinition.name: After
columnDefinition.description: Before (0) or After (1)

columnDefinition.name: Action
columnDefinition.description: Action to insert

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Standard Sequence number

columnDefinition.name: BaseAction
columnDefinition.description: Base action to determine insert location.

columnDefinition.name: After
columnDefinition.description: Before (0) or After (1)

columnDefinition.name: Table
columnDefinition.description: Table containing the data to be modified.

columnDefinition.name: Row
columnDefinition.description: Row containing the data to be modified.

columnDefinition.name: Column
columnDefinition.description: Column containing the data to be modified.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: Template for modification data.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Primary key, non-localized token

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: Value of the property

columnDefinition.name: Family
columnDefinition.description: Primary key

columnDefinition.name: Upgraded
columnDefinition.description: Primary key

columnDefinition.name: Family
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Family to which this image belongs

columnDefinition.name: Upgraded
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Upgraded image

columnDefinition.name: FTK
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, File to ignore

columnDefinition.name: Upgraded
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Upgraded image

columnDefinition.name: FTK
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, File to ignore

columnDefinition.name: Upgraded
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Upgraded image

columnDefinition.name: Target
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Target image

columnDefinition.name: FTK
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, File to ignore

columnDefinition.name: Family
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Family

columnDefinition.name: FTK
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, File to ignore

columnDefinition.name: Family
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, Family

columnDefinition.name: FTK
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key, File to ignore

columnDefinition.name: ParentId
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify a particular record in a parent table.

columnDefinition.name: ParentType
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify a particular parent type in a parent table.

columnDefinition.name: ChildId
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify a particular record in a child table.

columnDefinition.name: ChildType
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify a particular child type in a child table.

columnDefinition.name: WixVersion
columnDefinition.description: Version number of WiX.

columnDefinition.name: WixOutputFile
columnDefinition.description: Path to output file, if supplied.

columnDefinition.name: WixProjectFile
columnDefinition.description: Path to .wixproj file, if supplied.

columnDefinition.name: WixPdbFile
columnDefinition.description: Path to .wixpdb file, if supplied.

columnDefinition.name: ItemType
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify the item in another table.

columnDefinition.name: ItemId_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to an entry in another table.

columnDefinition.name: DependsOnType
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify the item in another table.

columnDefinition.name: DependsOnId_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to an entry in another table.

columnDefinition.name: WixPatchBaseline
columnDefinition.description: Primary key used to identify sets of transforms in a patch.

columnDefinition.name: ValidationFlags
columnDefinition.description: Patch transform validation flags for the associated patch baseline.

columnDefinition.name: Payload
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a Payload entry in the Payload table.

columnDefinition.name: ChainPackage_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a ChainPackage entry in the ChainPackage table for the parent Exe.

columnDefinition.name: BundleId
columnDefinition.description: Only valid after binding.

columnDefinition.name: ProviderKey
columnDefinition.description: Only valid after binding.

columnDefinition.name: PerMachine
columnDefinition.description: Only valid after binding.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: A 32-bit word that specifies the attribute flags to be applied to the chain.

columnDefinition.name: Payload_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a Payload entry in the Payload table.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: A 32-bit word that specifies the attribute flags to be applied to this package.

columnDefinition.name: Payload_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a Payload entry in the Payload table.

columnDefinition.name: Attributes
columnDefinition.description: A 32-bit word that specifies the attribute flags to be applied to this package.

columnDefinition.name: ChainPackage_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a ChainPackage entry in the ChainPackage table.

columnDefinition.name: ChainPackage_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a ChainPackage entry in the ChainPackage table.

columnDefinition.name: ChainPackage_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a ChainPackage entry in the ChainPackage table for the parent Msi.

columnDefinition.name: ChainPackage_Msp
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a ChainPackage entry in the ChainPackage table for the referenced Msp.

columnDefinition.name: ChainPackage_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a ChainPackage entry in the ChainPackage table.

columnDefinition.name: Package
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a ChainPackage entry in the ChainPackage table.

columnDefinition.name: Package
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a ChainPackage entry in the ChainPackage table.

columnDefinition.name: Table
columnDefinition.description: Name of table

columnDefinition.name: Column
columnDefinition.description: Name of column

columnDefinition.name: Nullable
columnDefinition.description: Whether the column is nullable

columnDefinition.name: MinValue
columnDefinition.description: Minimum value allowed

columnDefinition.name: MaxValue
columnDefinition.description: Maximum value allowed

columnDefinition.name: KeyTable
columnDefinition.description: For foreign key, Name of table to which data must link

columnDefinition.name: KeyColumn
columnDefinition.description: Column to which foreign key connects

columnDefinition.name: Category
columnDefinition.description: String category

columnDefinition.name: Set
columnDefinition.description: Set of values that are permitted

columnDefinition.name: Description
columnDefinition.description: Description of column

columnDefinition.name: WixSearch_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a WixSearch entry in the WixSearch table.

columnDefinition.name: ParentId_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a WixSearch entry in the WixSearch table.

columnDefinition.name: WixSearch_
columnDefinition.description: Reference to a WixSearch entry in the WixSearch table.

columnDefinition.name: WixSearch_
